sys_ux_data_broker_transform.name: Document Approval internationalization support
sys_ux_data_broker_transform.script:
function transform(input) { var titles = { "need_attention" : gs.getMessage("Needs Attention"), "document_approvals_this_year" : gs.getMessage("Document Approvals This Year"), "approvals_by_category_this_quarter" : gs.getMessage("Approvals By Category This Quarter"), "new_document_approvals" : gs.getMessage("New Document Approvals"), "recently_approved_documents" : gs.getMessage("Recently Approved Documents"), "active_approvals" : gs.getMessage("Active Approvals"), "approvals_completed" : gs.getMessage("Approvals Completed"), "document_status" : gs.getMessage("Document Status"), "document_approval_categories" : gs.getMessage("Document Approval Categories"), "document_approval_title" : gs.getMessage("Document Approval"), "welcome" : gs.getMessage("Welcome"), "document_approval_subtext" : gs.getMessage("Keep track of your document approvals with automated workflows."), "document_approval_login" : gs.getMessage("Log in to continue"), "document_approval_landing_subtext" : gs.getMessage("Submit documents for approval and manage previous submissions"), "document_approval_form_title" : gs.getMessage("Upload a Document"), "document_approval_form_name" : gs.getMessage("Document Name (max 40 characters)"), "document_approval_form_category" : gs.getMessage("Document Category"), "document_approval_form_description" : gs.getMessage("Briefly describe the document requiring approval (optional, max 4000 characters)"), "reference_number" : gs.getMessage("Reference no: "), "your_all_documents_title" : gs.getMessage("Your All Documents"), "your_returned_documents_title" : gs.getMessage("Your Returned Documents"), "home" : gs.getMessage("Home"), "all_documents_title" : gs.getMessage("All Documents"), "all_returned_documents_title" : gs.getMessage("All Returned Documents"), "document_view_number" : gs.getMessage("Number"), "document_view_document_type" : gs.getMessage("Document Type"), "document_view_status" : gs.getMessage("Status"), "document_view_created" : gs.getMessage("Created"), "404_message" : gs.getMessage("This page you were trying to reach doesn't seem to exist.
Lets get you back on the track.") }; return titles; }
